title: Nancy Drew - Stay Tuned for Danger
description:
<a href="http://www.herinteractive.com/Mystery_Games/Nancy_Drew/Stay_Tuned_For_Danger/pc" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.herinteractive.com/Mystery_Games/Nancy_Drew/Stay_Tuned_For_Danger/pc</a>

This is another discontinued 2nd title of the Nancy Drew series, Stay Tuned for Danger.

How to install
1. Burn or mount disk image (.cue)
2. Locate CD-Rom drive's root directory then execute SETUP.exe manually.
3. Skip DirectX setup unless your PC falls into antique category.

Note: Both Secrets Can Kill and Stay Tuned for Danger are discontinued due to sound card problem with newer PC system. However those are working flawlessly under Core 2 duo based 32-bit Windows 7 environment. Who knows? It's my wild guess that the initial version released by Her Interactive do have a problem then later Dreamcatcher version sorted'em out. Of course, this torrent comes from Dreamcatcher version.

Enjoy the game!
